text: Room dimensions and ceiling height meet project specs and TIA-569-E guidelines
HVAC installed to maintain 18–27°C with dedicated exhaust or cooling path
Dust, water, plumbing, or unrelated equipment not present in room
Dedicated 120V/208V 20A circuits for racks and IT gear installed per design
Telecom Grounding Busbar (TGB) installed and bonded to main building ground per TIA-607-D
Racks and ladder tray bonded to TGB with labeled #6 AWG minimum grounding wire

id: C. Racks, Cable Tray, and Termination Layout

text: Equipment racks, ladder trays, wall fields, and cabinet layouts match shop drawings
Fiber management systems and radius guides installed to spec
Cable tray clearances maintained above and below for lighting, access, and ceiling grid
Patch panels, termination blocks, and sleeves labeled per TIA-606 standards
Fiber and copper cables within racks tested and terminated to rack elevations
Power tested at each rack/cabinet PDU
All equipment racks labeled and bolted securely to floor
As-built layout, grounding diagram, elevation views, and labeling maps submitted
Commissioning report, warranty documents, and asset registry submitted

id: • ANSI/TIA-569-E, TIA-607-D, TIA-606-B, BICSI 002, CSA T530, NEC Article 800
• Manufacturer Specs: Chatsworth, Panduit, APC, Legrand, Middle Atlantic, Vertiv
